value.name: collision effect
value.tooltip: effect, material effect or sound spawned when this particle collides with something

value.name: death effect
value.tooltip: effect, material effect or sound spawned when this particle dies

value.name: sort bias
value.tooltip: use values between -10 and 10 to move closer and farther from camera (positive is closer)

value.name: relative direction
value.tooltip: particle initial velocity direction relative to the location's forward
